name: floweret
description: A runtime signature type-checker using native JavaScript types.
author: Laurent Payot

scripts.build-CJS: rm -rf dist/ && coffee -ctmb -o dist/ src/ && npm run size
scripts.build-ESM: rm -rf dist/ && coffee -cmb -o dist/ src/ && npm run size
scripts.test: npm run build-CJS && npm run build-tests && mocha
scripts.bundle: npm run build && cd benchmark && rollup -c && echo && cd bundles && stat -c '%n %sÂ bytes' *.gz | sort -n -k 2 | column -t
scripts.benchmark: npm run bundle && cd benchmark/bundles && node no-type-checking-benchmark.min.js && node floweret-benchmark.min.js && node runtypes.min.js && node flow-runtime-benchmark.min.js && echo
scripts.link: npm run test && cp package.json dist && cp *.md dist && cd dist && npm link
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && cp package.json dist && cp *.md dist && cd dist && rm -r **/*.map && npm publish
